reviewText: My kids love this series and have bought them all.  they watched them over and over so much the cases don't close.
Just what my boys wanted. They love this series. Lots of action...very disappointed it was discontinued. Definitely recommended for ages 5 & up.
My son was a huge fan of the show. He loves these and I hope I can find more seasons.
The videos were a hit at our house.  Exactly what our boys wanted.  We wish the series was back on TV - even mom liked to watch it with the boys!!
My kids love Hotwheels and really have gotten into Battle Force 5. It's a good series and one that I even enjoy watching with them. I'd love to drive to work one day in The Crawler.
Bought this as a Xmas gift for my kid--- only the first episode works!  The rest of the DVD skips!!! When I received the DVD set it was all shrinked wrapped.  VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! ;(
As advertised. Good product great delivery .
My nephew love this DVD. They watch it over and over. Fast shipping!
One of the best cartoons Ever. It's Very sad this never got it's 3rd Season.
IT WAS A HIT WITH MY GRANDSON...
Great...exciting....hours of fun watching for all ages
kid can't get enough of this show
My 9 year old son loves this series!
Ordered this set of 5 movies for my grandson.  He has all hot wheel movies and is crazy about them. Could not find in stores
